comments:
The New JSP, HTML, CSS, DTD, JavaScript Wizards throw a NPE if you bring up the wizard and have a non-folder/file selected in the navigator/explorer.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-02-03 10:12:07.938 
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException 
!STACK 0 
java.lang.NullPointerException 
         at org.eclipse.jst.jsp.ui.internal.wizard.NewJSPWizard$1.validatePage(Ne 
wJSPWizard.java:113) 
         at org.eclipse.ui.dialogs.WizardNewFileCreationPage.createControl(Wizard 
NewFileCreationPage.java:203) 
         at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.Wizard.createPageControls(Wizard.java:179) 
         at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.createPageControls(WizardDialog 
.java:611) 
         at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.setWizard(WizardDialog.java:978 
) 
         at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.updateForPage(WizardDialog.java
Need to add a check that if a container is not already selected, there's no need to check if there's a duplicate file name.
